meanings.definition: A spiny plant native to arid regions.
meanings.sent1: The cactus in the desert had sharp spikes.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful cactus in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cactus tried to hug me with its prickly arms!
meanings.sent4: She stood tall like a cactus in a world full of delicate flowers.
meanings.sent5: The cactus stood resilient in the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: Any of numerous succulent plants of the family Cactaceae.
meanings.sent1: Cacti come in various shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied different types of cacti.
meanings.sent3: The cactus family reunion was a thorny affair.
meanings.sent4: Her resilience was like that of a cactus in a dry land.
meanings.sent5: The cacti bloomed beautifully after the rain.
